name: require-injector
description: Resolve and replacing require() function in both NodeJS and browser side CommonJS packing tool like Webpack and Browserify.

scripts.iii: rm -rf spec/node_modules/require-injector ; mkdir spec/node_modules/require-injector ; cp -r lib spec/node_modules/require-injector/ ; cp -r dist spec/node_modules/require-injector/ ; cp *.js spec/node_modules/require-injector/ ; cp *.json spec/node_modules/require-injector/
scripts.init: rm -rf spec/node_modules/require-injector && mkdir spec/node_modules/require-injector && cp -r lib spec/node_modules/require-injector/ && cp -r dist spec/node_modules/require-injector/ && cp *.js spec/node_modules/require-injector/ && cp *.json spec/node_modules/require-injector/
scripts.init-win32:
xcopy lib spec
ode_modulesequire-injector\ /s/h/e/k/f/c && xcopy ts spec
ode_modulesequire-injector\ /s/h/e/k/f/c && xcopy dist spec
ode_modulesequire-injector\ /s/h/e/k/f/c && copy *.js spec
ode_modulesequire-injector\ && copy *.json spec
ode_modulesequire-injector\

author: Liu Jing
